I hope this question is historical enough to post here:
 
Does anyone know which kata (similar to which kata if the kata used had
evolved to the new one to adjust the new model of shorter katana)
Hayashizaki used for killing his opponent to avenge his father's death?
 

 <http://www.mjer.org/> 

"Iaijutsu is training for life-or-death confrontation. To quit means death.
Once you have decided to be an iaijutsu practitioner, you cannot quit!"
